LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="55543266aa5c4e89a20397a5902c3cb1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I owe you big-time for saving me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
'Cause for a second, I was like,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] is this how
it ends?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Is my journey over for good?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="55543266aa5c4e89a20397a5902c3cb1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf15"/]Ren[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] by the way.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm the chef
traveling with the research task force
led by [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf04"/]Chet[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="55543266aa5c4e89a20397a5902c3cb1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I don't consider myself a scientistâ€”I'm a
traveler on a journey to discover and
embrace flavors heretofore unknown...
LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="d9091be678d54a94b5a543e098d13534" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]It must be my lucky day![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was just
thinking that I needed a good sous-chef.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Would you do the honors?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d9091be678d54a94b5a543e098d13534" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]What do you mean you can't cook?[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
You certainly have the right look for it,[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
but no worries!
LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="54acdf62e5ae4d96bdd1be3ce8c3c248" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Hold it![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Don't get any closer![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="54acdf62e5ae4d96bdd1be3ce8c3c248" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]Sorry about that.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I may have overreacted.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
But there's really nothing worse than a
stray hair in a dish.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You get it, right?
LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="b646d220a51d49e19e1e5b1b7b6d44f6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Hey, bud,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what do you like to munch on?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b646d220a51d49e19e1e5b1b7b6d44f6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]If I had to guess, I'd say...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]Scrummy Bones![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm rarely wrong about these things.
LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="2d55fd3ce57b4c7488b0ed09feef9398" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Hey, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]if you're ever hungry,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't be shy![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You gotta keep your energy up![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2d55fd3ce57b4c7488b0ed09feef9398" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Sometimes the science-y folks around
here are so heads down they forget to eat.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I keep telling them brains need food too!
LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="ef0ad9092f8f4b1082c206bcba66cbb8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]This planet is a culinary treasure trove.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
There are so many new ingredients I've
never seen before.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ef0ad9092f8f4b1082c206bcba66cbb8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]What an amazing opportunity to show off
my talents as a chef![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ef0ad9092f8f4b1082c206bcba66cbb8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]And so now, the eternal question...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] What
shalI I cook today?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Creating a menu truly
is one of life's greatest pleasures.
LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="9bf8d0d06a124febb9b01c2eda6353f0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]My boss recently asked if I would be able
to whip up a dish that could make someone
relax almost instantly.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9bf8d0d06a124febb9b01c2eda6353f0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Hmm... [etc:Wait frame="8"/]I think a hearty soup would fit the
bill.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can already think of a few plants and
herbs that are both tasty and calming.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9bf8d0d06a124febb9b01c2eda6353f0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]That's one of my favorite things about
food.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It nourishes the body and the soul.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
And it tastes so good!
LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="262d5bf4e4144943bfe31508bf12b3ce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]What will I do when I get off this planet?[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Is that what you asked?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="262d5bf4e4144943bfe31508bf12b3ce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Probably just embark on another journey
to seek out more flavors.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Who knows how
many unknown ingredients are out there!
LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="e7a15f16b306436885bc060959c489ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I leave all the really brainy stuff to the
scientists.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I prefer to focus on my own
strengths.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Like food![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e7a15f16b306436885bc060959c489ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]As long as there are ingredients to use
and appetites to satisfy,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] of course!
LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="06a3e649be16436fbbbfe9e1e84d520c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I tried sprinkling a little ultra-spicy nectar
into a mushroom risotto the other day.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="06a3e649be16436fbbbfe9e1e84d520c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]Everyone looked at me like I was nuts and
wouldn't even try it![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I thought they'd at
least have SOME faith in my skills...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Hmph.
LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="b9e05044f6154a29ba909351f5515cd0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]You might be wondering why there is a
chef in this research task force.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b9e05044f6154a29ba909351f5515cd0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]All I can say is that making food is a
science all its own.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] One that can benefit
and motivate almost everyone![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b9e05044f6154a29ba909351f5515cd0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]But honestly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the only reason I'm here is
because [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf04"/]Chet[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] knew who I was and made an
impassioned plea for me to join him.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b9e05044f6154a29ba909351f5515cd0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]And as someone who's always exploring
new cuisines,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I thought another world
would be a great place to experiment!
LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="ecfbccc3766c45408029ecd9881597b5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Hey![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thanks for all the hard work you do.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Being a member of the Rescue Corps
seems like a pretty tough gig![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ecfbccc3766c45408029ecd9881597b5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]Do you ever get to take a break?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Or take
a night off to enjoy a good meal?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ecfbccc3766c45408029ecd9881597b5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Look at me worrying about you![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm sure
you know how to take care of yourself
by now.
LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="e72300cabc6540eda9ba2f959488d35d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]I know you're busy,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I hope you're taking
the time to prioritize a little self-care.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
A nice meal, maybe a bubble bath...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e72300cabc6540eda9ba2f959488d35d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]Running yourself ragged never has a
positive outcome.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Your mind and body
will suffer for it![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e72300cabc6540eda9ba2f959488d35d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Speaking of self-care,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm going to go
prioritize myself and get my favorite thing:[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
food![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll check back in with you later.
LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="bafbd30bccd1481d875cbc75d1f8e645" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Yes, it's my job,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but there's nothing I like
more than cooking for friends![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bafbd30bccd1481d875cbc75d1f8e645" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]I love the looks on their faces as they
enjoy a meal and,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] even better,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when I hear
a big, satisfied slurp![etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's the best!
LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="bc255d1ce18548238fc9ed495a214822" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]You might be wondering why there is a
chef in this research task force.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bc255d1ce18548238fc9ed495a214822" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]All I can say is that making food is a
science all its own.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] One that can benefit
and motivate almost everyone![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bc255d1ce18548238fc9ed495a214822" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]But honestly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the only reason I'm here is
because [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf04"/]Chet[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] knew who I was and made an
impassioned plea for me to join him.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bc255d1ce18548238fc9ed495a214822" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]And as someone who's always exploring
new cuisines,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I thought another world
would be a great place to experiment!
LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="d4bfe3b162a14e60ba0e431e3b87267c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Hey![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thanks for all the hard work you do.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Being a member of the Rescue Corps
seems like a pretty tough gig![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d4bfe3b162a14e60ba0e431e3b87267c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]Do you ever get to take a break?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Or take
a night off to enjoy a good meal?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d4bfe3b162a14e60ba0e431e3b87267c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Look at me worrying about you![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm sure
you know how to take care of yourself
by now.
LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="3d206a7d8058417d8a447e8b8b5509fd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]This planet is a culinary treasure trove.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
There are so many new ingredients I've
never seen before.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3d206a7d8058417d8a447e8b8b5509fd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]What an amazing opportunity to show off
my talents as a chef![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3d206a7d8058417d8a447e8b8b5509fd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]And so now, the eternal question...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] What
shalI I cook today?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Creating a menu truly
is one of life's greatest pleasures.
LF014.LF014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf15"/][UE:Meta key="653d2a7c4ff044d087935f7febce41dc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]My boss recently asked if I would be able
to whip up a dish that could make someone
relax almost instantly.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="653d2a7c4ff044d087935f7febce41dc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Hmm... [etc:Wait frame="8"/]I think a hearty soup would fit the
bill.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can already think of a few plants and
herbs that are both tasty and calming.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="653d2a7c4ff044d087935f7febce41dc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]That's one of my favorite things about
food.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It nourishes the body and the soul.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
And it tastes so good!
